content: yarnspirations says designed by lisa gentry /designers/lisa-gentry adapted by jeanne steinhilber /designers/jeanne-steinhilber bring joy into a loved one s life by gifting them this gorgeous crochet afghan created by the crochet crowd this intricate afghan pattern is worked up in ultra-soft red heart with love yarn crochet crowd link 1 please note that there is linked errata for this version 1 https //thecrochetcrowd com/crochet-all-in-the-family-blanket-pattern-stitch-along/
